modName: CBBE Bodyslide TBBP Red Sonja outfit
summary: This mod adds 12 bikinis, all craftable and upgradeable, in a scale mail bikini form, a la Red Sonja's Garb.
descriptionHtml:
:::::::::::::::Important update for October 2014:::::::::
I do NOT know how to make these work with the newer Bodyslide patches, sorry.  You could probably download the older Bodyslide and install it to some OTHER folder just for these outfits and they will still work, however, and it would still function fine.  I apologize for any inconveniences.

Red Sonja Armor 1.3
*NOW WORKING WITH BODYSLIDE!!!*

*If you want a Non TBBP variant, I have uploaded an image that hopefully will fix all of your problems. I honestry tried to get the non TBBP variants to function in bodyslide 2 but there were just so many problems with the exported nif. This way works just as well, it just takes a few more secs.*

This mod adds 12 bikinis, all craftable and upgradeable, with the exception of Aetherial, in a scale mail bikini form, a la Red Sonja's Garb.
Recipe for crafting: 1 ingot of type, 1 leather, 1 leather strips. (Add a Daedra heart for Daedric), in the misc section.
Recipe for upgrading: 1 ingot of type

Color options to choose from, each has a CUSTOM specular:
Iron
Steel
Dwarven
Orcish
Glass
Ebony
Silver
Gold
Elven
Daedric
Leather
Aetherial (This one wont be craftable, it will be hidden, tee hee, and it will have a unique enchantment!)

Special thanks to Caliente for CBBE, wouldn't be possible without him.
Special thanks also goes to mxwqtkl for getting this to work directly in Bodyslide for me
author: Buffscale McThundertail
